message: Hi Bob, I have a great product I think you'll be interested in. I'm offering it to you for $100. What do you think?
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I'm really interested but $100 is a bit above my budget.  How about $85?
Bob, I appreciate your interest. While $85 is closer, I still need a bit more to make this work. How about $90?
Alice, $90 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to go up to $87. This is my final offer.
